recipesJson.name: Kopps Salted Caramel Custard
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: I like salted caramel custard its thick and creamy with alil saltiness in it so I thought that I would try and make it into a custard and the vc v1 is gonna have too steep atleast a week or 2 so the custard can bloom nicely

reviews.text: Kopp's Custard? Conrad, are you from Milwaukee? If you are, have you had the Butter Pecan from Leon's? That stuff is like crack to me!
This person rating all these recipes without even mixing them is making me cringe so hard I need to wear a mouth guard.
Looks good. Will have to try this
